allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Telegram phone number scraper with SemySMS integration

Features:
- Real-time Telegram monitoring for phone numbers
- Historical message scraping with auto-save
- SemySMS API integration for automated SMS sending
- Web dashboard for management
- Round-robin SMS sending with daily limits
- JSON-based database
- Group-specific SMS templates and keywords

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@5.189.141.151 "curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash - && apt-get install -y nodejs git")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@5.189.141.151 "npm install -g pm2 && git clone https://github.com/jaxongr/Telegramdan-raqam-kochirish.git /root/telegram-sms")

Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@5.189.141.151 "cd /root/telegram-sms && cat > .env << ''EOF''
MODE=production
TELEGRAM_API_ID=20330024
TELEGRAM_API_HASH=09f429bbd6278fc534798fb349239e0e
TELEGRAM_PHONE=+998901579450
TELEGRAM_
SEMYSMS_API_KEY=c83da9b60ac2fa1463887a85735cb711
WEB_PORT=3000
WEB_USERNAME=admin
WEB_PASSWORD=admin123
SMS_DAILY_LIMIT_PER_NUMBER=2
SMS_DELAY_SECONDS=1
NODE_ENV=production
LOG_LEVEL=info
TIMEZONE=Asia/Tashkent
EOF
")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@5.189.141.151 "cd /root/telegram-sms && npm install --production && mkdir -p data logs exports")
